article:
Dear Lily,
Thank you   _  your letter. I read it after school today, and now let me  tell you something about my hobbies . I like swimming I swim every day   _  summer. You know summer in England is _  hot. I also like reading. I read all kinds of books. I read two _ three books a week. I enjoy writing, too. I want to be a writer in the future . I also like to play  _ my friend, Mickey. He is tall and needs a lot of exercises. So on _ we often go for a long walk around the lake near my house. Mickey likes jumping into the water to swim. He is a good _ Well, these are my hobbies. Please write to me and tell me about   _ .
